channel.title: 3 Small Questions
channel.description:
1. when i eat mantas i can eat super fast what do i change or add to fix that. 2. npcs automatically attack you when you walk near them how do i make them not attack 3. and where do i change drops on project czar?
EDIT: also i cant pickup 5 digit items i tried to change it and it didint work

item.title: 3 Small Questions
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

  1. when i eat mantas i can eat super fast what do i change or add to fix that.

^change the timer

case 391: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 100; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the Manta Ray!"); break; default: used = false; break; } } if (used) deleteItem(item, slot, 1); }

where you change

animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; the number to something higher i think, i dont really know just try

  1. and where do i change drops on project czar?

^ npcdrop.cfg?

Read full topic
